meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN - Park and Recreation Board Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the June 20, 2024, Arts and Culture Advisory Commission meeting minutes.
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Recommendation of new panelists to the Funding Programs Review Panel.
agenda_items.description: Recommendation of seventy-one (71) new panelists to the Office of Arts and Culture’s Funding Programs Review Panel.

agenda_items.title: Hi Line Trinity Train Design District Public Art Project.
agenda_items.description: Recommendation of the initiation of the Hi Line Trinity Train Design District Public Art Project, located at 1930 Hi Line, Dallas, TX in Council District 6.

agenda_items.title: Kelly Spring Traffic Circle.
agenda_items.description: Recommendation of the initiation of Kelly Spring Traffic Circle, Council District 12.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Executive Airport Streetscape.
agenda_items.description: Recommendation of the initiation of Dallas Executive Airport Streetscape, Council District 3.

agenda_items.title: Tipton Park Public Art project.
agenda_items.description: Recommendation of the artist, Peyton Harshfield, for the Tipton Park Public Art project, Council District 6.

agenda_items.title: Artist’s Design for Crockett Dog Park.
agenda_items.description: Recommendation in support of Artist’s Design by Sujin Lim for Crockett Dog Park.
